name: Joseph Trinen
text: Cold, watery, flavorless. Caesar salad had 1 crouton and a single slice of black olive(?) in it. Pasta was cold, watery, random chunks of cheese (couldn’t tell actually though) floating in it. Literally almost gagged trying to finish my lunch. How is this place in business??????????????????????

name: Brianna Marie
text: Sooooo..we’ve been coming to the mall since I was very young about 12 years now and we have always eaten there because the food IS pretty good. Though these past couple times I have gone the staff have been extremely rude and an older woman …More

name: THE TRUTHFUL
text: I love my pizza here.

name: Christina Torres
text: We catered lunch for 40 of our staff with only 2 days notice.  The food was excellent - it was well-packed - the staff at Villa was friendly and helpful.  Our staff raved about the garlic rolls!  We'll use them again.

name: Khandaker Shafi
text: Awesome people. Quick service, Great food, Quality Pizza. Great team work. Keep it up. Villa Barton Creek you guys are the rock.

name: JD Bailey
text: They microwave their food, and nothing looks or tastes fresh. A restaurant should never microwave food. A man was sitting where people set their plates as you order. And as we were were ordering a man interrupted (who looked like the manager) us to see if the cashier wanted ice cream. 10 dollars for a microwaved meal.

name: Muse Sike
text: I wanted to buy a kids menu with a slice of cheese pizza, a drink and chips. The gentleman  did something wrong and gave us a bigger slice pizza. The gentleman at the register, which seemed to be the manager, asked us in a very rude way …More

name: Andrew Payton
text: Food was microwaved and not very good. I wouldn’t eat here again ever.

name: Malcolm Trammell
text: This place deserves more recognition it's good especially for the price. And the people are humble above all else.

name: Islam Motin
text: I am muslim and we don't eat any pork. And when i order 3 slice pizza then manager came to me and asked me" if you don't mind are you muslim and i reply yes. and i asked why? and he said i will make you new pizza for you just give 10 …More

name: Alex 76
text: They took my food of a cold pan and I watched them microwave it.

name: David Perez
text: Fast service, kind staff and over all an amazing experience and good size pizza love this place

name: Jay C
text: The guy at the cashier asked me to put the forks in the holder.  He handed them to me barehanded and all over the eating side.  The food was cold.  The pizza had some flavor which is why I gave two stars instead of one.

name: Katharyne McCardle
text: Had spinach pizza and spinach stromboli same as i remember when i was a kid absolutely delicious!

name: Megan Turner
text: Horrible service. Either they are racist or only serve young "pretty-looking" females because there were two workers when I went and one of them was at the cashier with a customer and another came to take the order of the lady in front of …More

name: Louie Felipe Murphy
text: Better than a lot of other pizza places in the Austin area.

name: Omar Solaija
text: Extremely rude staff. Store was supposed to be open at 6 today. I got there at 615 and they still werent ready. When I asked how much longer it would be the lady shrugged her shoulders and just said "maybe ten, fifteen or twenty minutes... I dunno" and just turned away... Ridiculous behavior.

name: George Salemie
text: Pizza was not very good but what made our experience terrible is that the pepperoni pizza my 7 year was given had a jalapeño under the sauce, cheese and pepperoni, so she nor I saw it.  When I told the person working, he said he did not do …More

name: Chuck Schneider
text: Terrible service. Gave $20 bill to cashier who shortchanged me and said it was a $10 ( only had 20s with me so know he made the mistake he was unwilling to correct). …More

text: Employee laughed at me as I was ordering, he put his head down on the table and banged on the table repeatedly.
